mapper.insert: insert into fb_member values (SEQ_member_no.nextval, #{member_name}, #{id}, #{pw}, replace(#{address},',',''), replace(#{tel},',',''), replace(#{mail},',',''), 0)
mapper.update: update fb_member set pw=#{pw}, replace(#{address},',',''), replace(#{tel},',',''), replace(#{mail},',',''), 0, 0) where id=#{id} and member_name=#{member_name}
mapper.select: select * from FB_MEMBER a, FB_COUPON_BOOK b, FB_COUPON c where a.member_no = b.member_no(+) and b.coupon_no = c.coupon_no(+) and a.member_no = (select member_no from fb_member where id = #{id} and pw = #{pw})
select * from fb_lately_product a, fb_member b, fb_foods c where a.member_no = b.member_no and a.foods_no = c.foods_no and a.member_no = #{member_no} order by a.lately_no desc
